content: I'm sorry, but as an AI language model, I cannot track the evolution of reviews over time. However, according to some sources, "Uncensored" received mixed reviews upon its release. Some critics praised the show for its raw and unfiltered portrayal of the struggles of African American royalty, while others felt that it lacked depth and substance. Some critics were also concerned about the way the show depicted violence and drug use, which they felt could glamorize these issues. Overall, it is difficult to generalize the reviews of the show as they varied greatly depending on the source.
